name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer descends into the criminal underworld.

name: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families wage war for control of the Iron Throne while an ancient enemy threatens the realm.

name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in 1980s Indiana confront supernatural forces from a parallel dimension called the Upside Down.

name: The Office (US)
description: A mockumentary following the everyday lives of employees at a paper company in Scranton, Pennsylvania.

name: Succession
description: The dysfunctional Roy family battles for control of their global media empire as the patriarch steps back.

name: Wednesday
description: Wednesday Addams navigates Nevermore Academy while unraveling a supernatural mystery tied to her family.

name: The Bear
description: A fine-dining chef returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop, navigating grief, chaos, and culinary ambition.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players compete in deadly children's games for a massive prize in this South Korean thriller.

name: Bridgerton
description: The Bridgerton siblings navigate love, scandal, and society in Regency-era London.

name: The Last of Us
description: A smuggler escorts a teenage girl across post-apocalyptic America in search of a cure for a devastating pandemic.

name: Friends
description: Six friends navigate life, love, and careers in 1990s Manhattan in this iconic sitcom.

name: The Sopranos
description: A New Jersey mob boss navigates the demands of his criminal empire and family while seeing a psychiatrist.

name: Ozark
description: A financial advisor moves his family to the Ozarks to launder money for a Mexican drug cartel.

name: Ted Lasso
description: An American football coach takes over a struggling English soccer team with nothing but optimism and heart.

name: Euphoria
description: A group of high schoolers navigate identity, trauma, love, and addiction in this visually stunning drama.

name: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter protects a mysterious alien child across the Star Wars galaxy.

name: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family rises to power in post-WWI Birmingham, England, led by the cunning Thomas Shelby.

name: The Crown
description: A dramatization of Queen Elizabeth II's reign, exploring the personal and political challenges of the British monarchy.

name: Yellowstone
description: The Dutton family fights to protect the largest contiguous cattle ranch in America from those who seek to take their land.

name: Schitt's Creek
description: A wealthy family loses everything and must rebuild their lives in a small rural town they once bought as a joke.

name: Severance
description: Employees of a mysterious corporation undergo a procedure that separates their work and personal memories, uncovering dark secrets.

name: House of the Dragon
description: The Targaryen dynasty tears itself apart in a brutal civil war over succession to the Iron Throne, 200 years before Game of Thrones.

name: The White Lotus
description: Wealthy guests at a luxury resort chain reveal their darkest secrets in this satirical anthology exploring privilege and moral decay.

name: Suits
description: A college dropout with a photographic memory secretly works as a lawyer at a top New York City firm alongside a legendary closer.

name: Better Call Saul
description: The origin story of Breaking Bad's Saul Goodman, tracing a small-time lawyer's transformation into a criminal attorney.

name: The Boys
description: A group of vigilantes takes on corrupt superheroes controlled by a powerful corporation in this ultraviolent satirical series.

name: Fleabag
description: A sharp-witted woman in London navigates grief, family dysfunction, and love while breaking the fourth wall with the audience.

name: Abbott Elementary
description: Dedicated teachers at an underfunded Philadelphia public school navigate obstacles with humor and heart in this workplace mockumentary.

name: Arcane
description: Two sisters torn apart by conflict find themselves on opposing sides of a war between the utopian Piltover and the oppressed Zaun.

name: Shogun
description: An English sailor shipwrecked in 1600s Japan becomes entangled in a power struggle that will shape the nation's future.

name: Dexter
description: A forensic blood spatter analyst leads a secret double life as a serial killer who targets other murderers.

name: The Walking Dead
description: Survivors navigate a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies, facing threats from both the dead and the living.

name: Only Murders in the Building
description: Three true-crime-obsessed neighbors investigate murders in their Upper West Side apartment building while recording a podcast.

name: Loki
description: The God of Mischief is recruited by the Time Variance Authority to fix the timeline and discovers the truth about the multiverse.

name: Andor
description: A thief's journey from self-interest to rebellion against the Galactic Empire in the years before Rogue One.

name: True Detective
description: An anthology series where detectives unravel dark crimes across different American landscapes and time periods.

name: Black Mirror
description: A dark anthology series exploring the unintended consequences of technology on humanity.

name: Homeland
description: A brilliant but volatile CIA officer pursues terrorists while battling her own mental health challenges.

name: Greatest TV Villains of All Time
description: The most iconic, terrifying, and complex villains in television history. These antagonists elevated their shows and became cultural touchstones.

name: Most Iconic TV Duos & Partnerships
description: The greatest partnerships in TV history - from crime partners to unlikely friendships, these duos defined their shows.

name: Best Character Arcs in TV History
description: Characters who underwent the most dramatic and compelling transformations in television history.

name: Fan Favorite Characters - Highest Fan Heat Index
description: The characters with the most passionate fan followings, measured by our Fan Heat Index scoring system.

name: Greatest TV Antiheroes
description: The morally complex protagonists who blurred the line between hero and villain, redefining television storytelling.

name: Funniest TV Characters of All Time
description: The most hilarious TV characters who made us laugh until we cried, from sitcom legends to dark comedy icons.

name: Best TV Couples of All Time
description: The most beloved, passionate, and unforgettable romantic relationships in television history.

name: Best Characters in Animated TV
description: The most compelling characters from animated television series, proving that animation is a medium, not a genre.

name: Most Powerful Women in TV
description: The strongest, most commanding female characters in television history — leaders, fighters, strategists, and survivors.

name: Greatest TV Mentors & Teachers
description: The mentors who shaped heroes, taught lessons, and left lasting impacts on TV's greatest characters.
